statements: SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspection_results WHERE result = 'pass';
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM quality_control_inspection_results WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT product_name FROM quality_control_inspection_results WHERE result = 'fail';
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_name, inspection_notes FROM quality_control_inspection_results WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspection_results WHERE inspection_notes LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspection_results WHERE result = 'pass';
SELECT inspection_id, inspection_date, inspector_name FROM quality_control_inspection_results WHERE result = 'fail' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, result FROM quality_control_inspection_results WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT inspection_id, inspection_notes FROM quality_control_inspection_results WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT DISTINCT inspector_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inspections FROM quality_control_inspection_results GROUP BY inspector_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_inspections DESC;
SELECT * FROM inspection_results WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM product_quality WHERE pass_rate > 0.9 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, batch_number FROM product_quality WHERE pass_rate < 0.8 ORDER BY batch_number ASC;
SELECT product_name, batch_number, pass_rate FROM product_quality WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT inspector_name, result FROM inspection_results WHERE inspection_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM inspection_results WHERE result = 'Pass';
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM product_quality ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, COUNT(*) FROM inspection_results GROUP BY inspector_name;
SELECT inspection_date, result FROM inspection_results WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT p.product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inspections FROM product_quality p JOIN inspection_results i ON p.product_id = i.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name ORDER BY total_inspections DESC;
SELECT * FROM inspection_results;
SELECT inspector_name, outcome FROM inspection_results ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_inspections FROM inspection_results WHERE outcome='Passed';
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT defect_name, severity FROM defects WHERE affected_products > 5 ORDER BY severity DESC, defect_name;
SELECT * FROM inspection_results WHERE outcome = 'Pass';
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspection_results WHERE inspection_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE production_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT defect_name, severity FROM defects WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY defect_name DESC;
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_name, outcome FROM inspection_results WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inspections;
SELECT inspection_id, inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM products WHERE production_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT inspector_name, email FROM inspectors ORDER BY inspector_name ASC;
SELECT defect_name, defect_description FROM defects WHERE LENGTH(defect_description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspector_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, production_date FROM products ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, email FROM inspectors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT id, product_name, manufacturer_name FROM products;
SELECT inspector_name, department FROM inspectors WHERE department='Quality Control';
SELECT * FROM inspection_results WHERE result='Pass' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(product_id) AS total_products FROM inspection_results;
SELECT MAX(log_timestamp) FROM logs;
SELECT * FROM inspection_results WHERE result='Pass' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, production_date FROM products WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY manufacturer_name;
SELECT inspector_name, department FROM inspectors LEFT JOIN departments ON inspectors.department = departments.id ORDER BY inspector_name;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, description FROM products WHERE description LIKE '%quality%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_date, result FROM inspection_results WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY inspection_date;
